ISSUE.TITLE: Old jbibtex library breaks for identifiers starting with dot
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: **Describe the bug** When performing a BibTeX import, identifiers starting with a dot are not recognized. This was seen on DSpace CRIS 7.2 but should be a problem generally as jbibtex is in the old version (1.0.10 instead of the current 1.0.20) in both systems. **To Reproduce** Import a BibTeX file using an identifier starting with a period "." as generated by Citavi. **Expected behavior** Import succeeds.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #8424 from 4Science/CST-6448_auth_pagination Pagination support for multiple objects and authorization features endpoint

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Update jbibtex library to version 1.0.20 Fixes #8403
Update jbibtex library to version 1.0.20 Fixes #8403
